org.apache.batik.transcoder

Class AbstractTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderSupport
      • org.apache.batik.transcoder.AbstractTranscoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transcoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SVGTranscoder, ToSVGAbstractTranscoder, XMLAbstractTranscoder

    public abstract class AbstractTranscoder
extends TranscoderSupport
implements Transcoder
    This class can be the base class of a transcoder which may support transcoding hints and/or error handler.
